Header: Embilitiya, Katugastota, Badulla arrests made over alleged drug-possession
Content: Three persons have been arrested in Embilitiya, Katugastota and Badulla, in three separate incidents, for the alleged possession of Cannabis. It is alleged that the suspect arrested in  Embilitiya was in possession of  13 kilogrammes of Cannabis.  Another suspect, allegedly possessing Cannabis, was arrested in a raid carried out by the Anti-Corruption Unit of the Kandy Division. Meanwhile, the Police Media Unit stated that a woman allegedly in possession of Heroin and a variety of Cannabis, more commonly known as KG, was arrested in the Udunuwara area in Badulla.
